marklogic.body:
The CP deal is a monster, unions have gone from representing and protecting the rights of low earners to a collective bargaining WMD held over the head of an reluctant government.
I heard a quote from the news, think it was a Dublin independent TD who said that if every Irish civil servant, who was on OVER 100k a year, reduced their salary down to 100k a year, then the government would raise 260mil, which is 100mil more than they are after with this years property tax.
Obviously this tax is not Gaining traction with a large swathe of the population, who feel that the private sector has little to offer after being Bled for so long.
